== Contact Bangladeshi Team ==
We always welcome our team members. In any case, if you would like to volunteer some time to assist the team or would like some more information on the various aspects of the team, then please do not hesitate to get in contact with one of the members below.

=== Main Team Contact ===

The main team contact is appointed by the Ubuntu Bangladeshi Team Council Members, who is responsible for providing the link between the Ubuntu-BD team and the overall Ubuntu community. For Bangladeshi Team, we have two contact persons. If you have questions or concerns about the team in general then please contact one of the following persons:

* <nowiki>[[ShahriarTariq|Shahriar Tariq]]</nowiki>, Team Leader <shahriar@linux.org.bd>

== Detailed Contact of the Bangladeshi Team ==

There are several roles and contacts for the Bangladeshi team. For the ease of communication the full list is given below.
